item.title: Work System Factors Affect NICU Nurse Practitioner Workload
item.description: Several work system barriers contribute to high workload and facilitators help alleviate it for nurse practitioners in NICUs, a study reports. Medscap...

item.title: Persistent Pollutant May Raise Parkinson's Disease Risk
item.description: A recent study is the first to suggest a potential link between long-term exposure to high levels of trichloroethylene and an increased risk for Parki...

item.title: Why so Many Physicians Struggle With the ‘Social Clock’
item.description: After years of training, many doctors find themselves successful on paper but feeling late to their own lives. Here’s how to stop playing catch-up. Me...

item.title: Cannabis Access Tied to Lower Opioid Use in Cancer Patients
item.description: Researchers examined the association between cannabis dispensary openings and opioid dispensing among commercially insured adults with cancer. Medscap...

item.title: Food Allergy Diets Narrow Toddlers’ Nutritional Diversity
item.description: Toddlers on elimination diets for food allergies are at risk for reduced diet and food allergen diversity, researchers say. Medscape Medical News
